New Records: Matthew Wade scored 41 not out from just 17 balls, breaking a record for the fastest half-century in a T20 World Cup semi-final
Key Match Events: Matthew Wade hit three sixes in a row to seal the win for Australia in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Finch mentioned the team's performance and the impact of the toss, stating it was a great game of cricket
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Finch praised Matthew Wade's nerve and the team's ability to handle pressure
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a thrilling finish, with Pakistan narrowly losing after a stunning chase
